main event: An observer sighted a bright red light moving in a NE direction in Appleton, Wisconsin on February 4, 1968.
interesting points: The object was observed moving for about 20 minutes,The observer described hearing a humming sound during the sighting,The light changed brightness, seemingly disappearing and reappearing,The object appeared to move straight up and then laterally at a high speed,The observer noted it seemed bigger than the moon and glowed.
witness description: A 29-year-old male who has seen similar phenomena before.
